## waitForChild() function

Wait for a child process to exit, collecting output, errors, and exit status.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function waitForChild(child: ChildStreams): Promise<ChildResult>;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  child | <code>ChildStreams</code> |  |
